name: The Last Train
description: As one of the last few survivors of World War II America, help the remaining survivors using your train piloting skills. During the journey you will come across many survivors and you will be rewarded generously by the rich and get the moral satisfaction of helping the poor. Who will you choose??
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Windows 7 處理器: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher 記憶體: 2 GB 記憶體 顯示卡: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era) DirectX: 版本：9.0 儲存空間: 1 GB 可用空間
recommended_requirements: 建議配備: 記憶體: 3 GB 記憶體 儲存空間: 1 GB 可用空間
